recipe_name: Jasmine rice with lime and coriander
author: Richard Phillips
method: Place the rice into a pan with a lid. Cover the rice with twice its volume of water. Add the cloves and cardamom then bring to the boil. Reduce the heat and simmer for 10-12 minutes, part covered with a lid, until completely cooked. Add the lime juice and coriander stalks and stir. To serve, spoon the rice into a bowl and garnish with the coriander leaves.
ingredients: 200g/7oz jasmine rice,  5 cloves,  5 cardamom pods, split,  1 lime, juice only,  1 tbsp chopped coriander stalks,  1 handful fresh coriander leaves, to serve
